question: (Jon of the Clue Crew stands with some bronze busts of inductees at the Pro Football Hall of Fame in Canton, OH.)  Nick Buoniconti, Larry Csonka, Bob Griese, Jim Langer, Larry Little & Paul Warfield were all enshrined in the Hall of Fame & were all members of this undefeated team
